name: Payload (Iddmeister)
description:
Little game I made for the Blackthornprod Game Jame #2. Didn't get a lot of time to work on it and this is my first successfull Game Jam but I'm happy with how it turned out.

Space - Thrust

Left and Right arrow keys for turning

Hold M for map

Pick up and deliver all the payloads from the 3 MINI PLANETS to win

Credits:

  • Made with the Godot Engine
  • Font is Forced Square from Dafont
  • Sound effects were made in Bfxr
  • Music was made in Bosca Ceoil
  • All the crummy art is made by me using paint.net
